channel.title: The Moparscape General Discussion and General Programming Sections
channel.description:
Will be back later.
I was attempting to move the sections from the bottom of the Moparscape forums to the top, so that they would appear right below the announcements section. This didn't work out as planned (although I did expect it to work given the circumstances), so the sections are currently unavailable. They should be back tomorrow.
My apologies to anyone who makes use of those sections.

item.title: The Moparscape General Discussion and General Programming Sections
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It looks like it is working correctly now.

Read full topic
